title: Crystal Haluzan, RPh
description: Crystal convocated in 2008 from the University of Saskatchewan with her Bachelors of Science in Pharmacy. She entered into Compounding in 2008. cleaned_text: Crystal convocated in 2008 from the University of Saskatchewan with her Bachelors of Science in Pharmacy. She entered into Compounding in 2008. She joining the American Academy of Anti-Aging (A4M) in 2010 taking many of their integrative medicine modules. In 2016, Crystal completed her C4 Dermatology course through the Professional Compounding Centers of America (PCCA) to obtain her Dermatology, Wound and Scar expert designation. Crystal has a special interest in preventative health, gut health and pediatric medications.
